title: shri saambashiva
sahitya:
shrI sAmbashiva sadguru divya caraNa dAsOham



anupallavi



 shrI sarasvati vilAsa shiva pUjAdurandhara



caraNam

 parama puruSa paramparya vara nAdOpAsana nirata pancanada kSEtra nivAsa karuNAkara

 dharaNIvara mama agjnAna timira bhAnusama tEjO harikEsha rUpa guNa parAtparam bhajEham
